1.2.1: Fixed missing scope for ListFiles component.
1.3.0: Added support for filtering files in ListFiles component.
Added standard outport types for ListFiles component: item, items, file.
1.3.1: Fixed NewFile component detection of new files.
1.3.2: Fixed searching files in ListFiles component when using Custom search query.
1.4.0: Fixed returning metadata in the GetFile component.
Added new component DownloadFile to retrieve the content of the file.
1.4.4: NewFile: fixes, improvements. Added DEBUG info messages. Set the DEBUG configuration key in the Backoffice to true to see the messages.
1.4.5: MoveFileOrFolder: fixes - prevent 'Increasing the number of parents is not allowed', added DEBUG info message - logging file metadata and request params. Set the DEBUG configuration key in the Backoffice to true to see the messages.
1.4.6: Debug messages are turned off by default. Set the DEBUG configuration key in the Backoffice to true to see the messages (currently in the NewFile and in the MoveFileOrFolder components only).
1.4.7: CreateFolder, FindFileOrFolder, UploadFile: handle the filename or folder name containing special characters.
2.0.1: Removed deprecated components: GetFile, ExportFile. Use DownloadFile instead. Removed ListFiles. Use FindFilesOrFolders instead.
Added new components: UpdatedFile, GetFileMetadata, CreateFileFromText, AddFileOrFolderPermission, CreateShortcut, UpdateFile.
Improved input fields UX of multiple components.
Improved labels and tooltips of all components.
Improved output variables of all components.
2.1.0: FindFilesOrFolders: added support for recursive search and ordering of returned items.
